title: Mizlala
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Mediterranean, Beer/Wine, Middle Eastern, Afghani, Turkish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A vegan menu was added to this bar and restaurant in Nahalat Binyamin in 2015. Offers Afghani and Turkish main dishes, including a black bean taco, semolina kuba dumplings stuffed with apricot and green almonds, and desserts such as pineapple carpaccio and dark chocolate kasata. Has a wine list and well-stocked bar.
